entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
